itunes:title: 281 - Make Merch, Create an Accessible Brand and 3 Powerful Design Guidelines with Aaron Draplin
itunes:author: Aaron Draplin, Jordan Aaron, Alex Sugg, Andy J Pizza, Yoni Wolf
itunes:summary:
DRAPLIN IS ON THE SHOW!! This man is one of my biggest inspirations and heroes and I COULD NOT BE MORE EXCITED to share this big chat I had with him. I don’t think this podcast would exist without this man and all he’s done for the creative world.

***WARNING: CONTAINS EXPLICIT LANGUAGE***

This episode is really special and it’s packed full of goodies:
- Tips from Draplin’s New Merch Class
- How to Make an Authentic Brand
- 3 Powerful Design Principles to Create By
- Avoiding The Dicey Side of the Creative Industry
- How to Find Unique Inspiration
- MUCH MORE!
